name: The Westcoast Drive: Lowrider Simulator
description:
Gear up for an exhilarating journey through the sun-soaked streets of the American West Coast with "The Westcoast Drive: Lowrider Simulator." This captivating indie driving game pays homage to the rich and vibrant lowrider culture of the USA, featuring a dazzling array of customized vehicles and iconic lowrider classics. Feel the excitement of driving a classic American lowrider. Discover the Open World City, accomplish missions, and search for hidden collectibles.

"The Westcoast Drive: Lowrider Simulator" invites you to step into the world of lowriders and experience the passion, artistry, and culture of the American West Coast like never before. Whether you're a devoted lowrider enthusiast or simply seeking a relaxing driving experience, this game offers a unique and immersive journey through the heart of lowrider culture on the iconic West Coast.

Features
  • Unique American Lowriders: Cruise in a stunning collection of American lowriders, each with its distinct style, from classic classics to modern marvels.
  • 3 Exciting Game Modes: Choose from Free Roam, Time Trial, and Missions for varied gameplay experiences.
  • Relaxing Driving: Embrace a laid-back West Coast vibe while exploring the vibrant virtual city.
  • Steam Achievements: Keep tabs on your achievements and compete all objectives.
  • Missions Galore: Complete 20 delivery missions and take on 10 cop chase missions for action-packed challenges.
  • Stunt Driving & Collectibles: Showcase your skills and discover hidden treasures throughout the city.
  • Ragdoll Pedestrians: Encounter unpredictable reactions from pedestrians in the bustling urban environment.
  • Vibrant Open World City: Explore a dynamic city with realistic traffic and pedestrians.
  • Customization Options: Personalize your lowriders with different skins, colors, rims, and more.
